detail_desc: Sleeveless, cropped sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a double-layered trim at the hem that wraps over at the front.
Thin, gold-plated metal rings in various designs.
Two pairs of gold-plated metal hoop earrings. Diameter 1 cm and 2 cm.
Gold-plated, thin metal chain necklace decorated with a bar-shaped metal bead. Adjustable length 39-45 cm.
Two gold-plated, thin metal-chain bracelets, each decorated with a metal bead. Adjustable length 16.5-18.5 cm.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.

Soft, non-wired, ribbed jersey bra tops with cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. No fasteners. The tops are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.

Soft, non-wired, ribbed jersey bra tops with cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. No fasteners. The tops are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.

Dress in a patterned viscose weave with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and yoke at the front with a flounced trim that continues over the shoulders. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a seam at the waist and hem to create width in the skirt. Unlined.

Dress in a patterned viscose weave with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and yoke at the front with a flounced trim that continues over the shoulders. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a seam at the waist and hem to create width in the skirt. Unlined.

Dress in soft viscose twill with a collar, buttons to the waist and flap chest pockets. Long sleeves with a tab and button, buttoned cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and diagonal side pockets. Unlined.
Bell-shaped skirt in imitation leather with an adjustable, elasticated waist and visible zip at the back. Lined.

Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs. Double layer at the front with a practical inner top for easier nursing access and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Short skirt in slightly stretchy cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and patch front pockets. Unlined.

Dress in soft tulle with a shimmering pattern. Round neckline with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, short puff sleeves with narrow elastication around the hems, and a flared skirt. Lined.
A-line, pleated dress in airy chiffon with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short butterfly sleeves. Lined.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a frill-trimmed grandad collar, frilled button placket, long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuss with a frill trim.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a frill-trimmed grandad collar, frilled button placket, long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuss with a frill trim.

Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The socks are made from COOLMAX®, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre blend that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.
Short thin metal chain necklace with a text pendant. Adjustable length, 43-51 cm.
Short thin metal chain necklace with a text pendant. Adjustable length, 43-51 cm.
Straight-style top in an airy rib knit with a round neckline, dropped shoulders, short sleeves and high slits in the sides.
Straight-style top in an airy rib knit with a round neckline, dropped shoulders, short sleeves and high slits in the sides.
Straight-style top in an airy rib knit with a round neckline, dropped shoulders, short sleeves and high slits in the sides.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy rib knit. High waist with covered elastication and wide, straight legs.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Thin metal chain necklace with letter pendants decorated with pearly plastic beads. Adjustable length 44-51.5 cm.
Cropped, fitted sports vest top in stretch jersey with a round neckline and racer back.
Cropped, fitted sports vest top in stretch jersey with a round neckline and racer back.
Set with one ear cuff, five non-matching earrings and two hoop earrings that can be worn as a pair. Size from 0.2 cm to 2 cm.
Set with three ear cuffs, three non-matching earrings and two hoop earrings that can be worn as a pair. Size from 0.2 cm to 2.5 cm.
Set with three ear cuffs, three non-matching earrings and two hoop earrings that can be worn as a pair. Size from 0.2 cm to 2.5 cm.

Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. 20 pairs of studs, one pair of hoops and four pairs with pendants. Eight of the pairs are decorated with sparkly glass stones and two have plastic pendants. Size from 0.2 cm to 7.5 cm.
Relaxed-fit shorts in a rustle-weave cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a press-stud.
Relaxed-fit shorts in a rustle-weave cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a press-stud.
Pyjama shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly and side pockets.
Pyjama shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly and side pockets.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Lined hood, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Padded gilet in a quilted weave with a detachable, lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a round tab and chin guard, and pockets in the side seams. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Lined.

Shacket in heavy jersey with shimmering metallic sequins. Collar, press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and concealed front pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and cuffs with press-studs.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hoodie in printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a lined hood with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Boxy-style T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, reflective details and soft fleece inside. Stand-up collar, a detachable hood with a soft fleece lining, and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Raglan sleeves, welt front pockets and jersey trims around the hood, cuffs and hem. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, reflective details and soft fleece inside. Stand-up collar, a detachable hood with a soft fleece lining, and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Raglan sleeves, welt front pockets and jersey trims around the hood, cuffs and hem. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Boiler suit in soft, washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and short sleeves. Flap chest pockets, front and back pockets, a detachable belt with D-rings at the waist and wide, straight legs.

Long, A-line dress in a crisp organic cotton weave with smocking at the top. Square neckline with concealed elastication to keep the dress in place and wide, half-length sleeves with a voluminous puff at the shoulders and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the knees and a flared, asymmetric skirt. Unlined.

Short, fitted, smocked dress in a crisp, patterned organic cotton weave. Square neckline and concealed elastication at the top to hold the dress in place. Long, wide sleeves with a voluminous puff at the shoulders and smocking at the cuffs. Unlined.

Long, fitted, smocked dress in a crisp organic cotton weave. Square neckline and concealed elastication at the top to hold the dress in place. Wide, half-length sleeves with a voluminous puff at the shoulders and smocking at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the hem and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Calf-length trousers in soft, ribbed viscose jersey. High waist with covered elastication and straight, wide legs.
Tights in a soft, fine, rib-knit wool blend with soft elastication at the waist.
Tights in a soft, fine, rib-knit wool blend with soft elastication at the waist.

Jacket in soft fleece made partly from recycled polyester designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves. Narrow elasticated trim at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Jacket in soft fleece made partly from recycled polyester designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves. Narrow elasticated trim at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Lightweight jacket in soft faux shearling with fine details. Double-layered hood, front pockets and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Unlined.
